text: Ancenis-Saint-Géréon is a commune of 10,802 people (2017). It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Loire-Atlantique department in western France. It was created on 1 January 2019 from the former communes of Ancenis (the seat) and Saint-Géréon. == References == Category:2019 establishments in France Category:Communes in Loire-Atlantique
title: Ancenis-Saint-Géréon
